nodes.text: Rel Keteris was a Rodian pilot who flew for Jabba the Hutt during the Galactic Civil War.

During 1 ABY, Rel Keteris flew as a pilot for Jabba the Hutt. At one point, he could be found outside the Mos Espa spaceport on Tatooine. While there, he encountered a spacer, and explained the perks of flying for Jabba.
Rel Keteris is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. In the game, he simply persuades players to become a pilot for Jabba.
